heading: Welcome to your local government service
leadParagraph: Please complete every selection specified below and submit when ready
insetText: Processing of your details can take upto 8 weeks
firstParagraph: Once you've completed each section below you will be given the chance to review your responses before submitting them
secondParagraph: You will be asked basic information about yourself and your parents. You can review and amend your answers before submitting them.
